ygData.subject: Re: pvp bard song suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: Love the idea about Lament As far as the duel weild thing goes, I m pretty sure you can t cheat the delay in your second hand, as I noticed when I went from
ygData.messageBody:
Love the idea about Lament

As far as the duel weild thing goes, I'm pretty sure
you can't cheat the delay in your second hand, as I
noticed when I went from pgt (6/22) to a cold iron
mornging star (9/35). I was crushing a lot less than
I used to slash. Of course, I wasn't actually timing,
and could have been intoxicated/sedated at the time.
In fact, just got an email this morning asking me if I
fell asleep in game last night :P

Face first on the space bar
Llewrend Lynnhaven
